word:
We held our opening exercises in the new building. The Spirit of the Lord was present. We felt pleased and grateful to God that Brother 


                                     -231- 

Herbert Lacey had been raised up from his sickness, and was able to be with us and take a part in the opening of the school. Brother and Sister Haskell, as experienced laborers, were a great help to us in the work of preparation, in devising and planning to get things in order, that there should be no delay.
